Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class IslandTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.IslandTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class IslandTile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the physical island tile displayed in the game. It differs from the island because the last one can actually be the composition of multiple tiles.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student) throws NullPointerException
      Adds a new student to the tile (not null).
      Parameters:
      student - The student to be added.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - Thrown if the student is null.

    • addTower

      public void addTower(Tower tower) throws NullPointerException, NoLegitActionException
      Method to add a tower to the tile if not already present.
      Parameters:
      tower - The tower (not null) to be added.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the tower is null.
      NoLegitActionException

    • removeTower

      public void removeTower()
      Method to remove the tower, no matter what tower it is. Keep in mind that this method does not move the removed tower back its player's board!

    • removeTower

      public void removeTower(Tower tower)
      Method to remove the tower passed via parameter. If not equal I don't remove the tower.
      Parameters:
      tower - The tower that has to be removed.

    • getStudents

      public List<Student> getStudents()
      Returns the list of students on the tile.
      Returns:
      Students on the tile.

    • getTower

      public Optional<Tower> getTower()
      Returns the tower on the tile.
      Returns:
      Tower on the tile.
